description:
The Ayanokouji Martial Arts School is a school affiliated to the http://anidb.net/ch95156 [Five Traditions], located in Kyoto prefecture. The school`s jurisdiction covers the remaining of the Kansai region not under http://anidb.net/ch95149 [Heijou Institute]`s responsibility. Despite being part of the Five Traditions, Ayanokouji stands as a traditional school with a lot of history, with http://anidb.net/t7097 [toji] from Ayanokouji treated with great respect. In times of emergency, the http://anidb.net/ch95155 [Special Sword Administration Bureau] can assume the school as a temporary headquarters.
Source: Toji no Miko Wiki
name: Ayanokouji Bugei Gakusha
